name: payment-health-check
description: Payment Health Check Automation using Postman/Newman

scripts.test:json: newman run "Payment Health Check.postman_collection.json" --reporters cli,json --reporter-json-export postman_reports/result.json
scripts.test:html: newman run "Payment Health Check.postman_collection.json" --reporters cli,html --reporter-html-export postman_reports/result.html
scripts.test:all: newman run "Payment Health Check.postman_collection.json" --reporters cli,json,html --reporter-json-export postman_reports/result.json --reporter-html-export postman_reports/result.html

author: Bizup Automation Team
